page.title: 17Life Styles
page.content: At twelve o'clock we have lunch.I have school dinners which we eat in the classroom after we have covered the desks with tableclothes.We have to eat it all up. After dinner we go out to play on the field if it is fine.We come in at about 1.15.If it is warm we might have swimming.On Mondays we have singing and on Thursdays we have handbells or sewing. We have another playtime at 2.30 for 15 minutes.After play we usually carry on with whatever we were doing before play.We go home at 3.20. When I get home I let the dog out then I get mum to take the cover off the swimming pool and go for a swim.I sometimes play with my best friend Sacha.I go inside at six and watch televiion.I go to bed at 10.30.
